name: rotating-workout-app
description: Simple SPA in which a rotating workout list is displayed and cycled through

scripts.start: if-env NODE_ENV=production && npm run start:prod || npm run start:dev
scripts.start:prod: export NODE_ENV=production&& concurrently "forever -c node server.js" "npm run client"
scripts.start:dev: start export NODE_ENV=development&& concurrently "nodemon --ignore 'client/*'" "npm run client"
